snippet: The grandmother of a 7-year-old girl killed by a Detroit police officer testified at his manslaughter trial on Tuesday that she doesn't feel she can trust the police....

headline.print_headline: Grandmother of Girl Killed by Detroit Police Said They 'Came to Kill'
headline.main: Grandmother of Girl Killed by Detroit Police Said They 'Came to Kill'

lead_paragraph: The grandmother of a 7-year-old girl killed by a Detroit police officer testified at his manslaughter trial on Tuesday that she doesn't feel she can trust the police.
